subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Patrick Crayton, left, made seven catches for 184 yards, including touchdown receptions of 59 and 37 yards that helped the Cowboys pull away in the third quarter in a victory against the Rams.
snippet: Patrick Crayton, left, made seven catches for 184 yards, including touchdown receptions of 59 and 37 yards that helped the Cowboys pull away in the third quarter in a victory against the Rams.
